titleStmt.title: An exact narrative of the affection, services, sufferings, and expences of Capt. Reeve Williams; both at sea and land for the advantage of the publique interest of the Common-wealth of England; from the beginning of the late vvarre to this present: humbly tendered unto the consideration of His Excellency the Lord General Cromwell, and all other persons of honour and ingenuity, whom it may or shall concerne.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Reeve, Capt.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
